name: RecordLinkage
displayName: Group of items providing information on record linkage.

name: RecordLinkage.legalBasis
dataverseAlias: Is there a specific legal regulation/permission for record linkage?
displayName: Indication whether there is a specific regulations/permission for record linkage.

name: RecordLinkage.legalBasisDetails
dataverseAlias: Please indicate which specific legal basis allows for record linkage
displayName: Information specifying which specific legal basis allows for record linkage.

name: RecordLinkage.informedConsent
dataverseAlias: Has an informed consent been obtained to allow the linkage?
displayName: Indication whether an informed consent that allows record linkage has been obtained.

name: RecordLinkage.responsibleInstitutions
dataverseAlias: Who are the responsible institutions and authorities who must agree to the record linkage?
displayName: Institutions and authorities that must agree to the record linkage.

name: RecordLinkage.additionalCosts
dataverseAlias: Are there additional costs for record linkage?
displayName: Indication whether there are additional costs for record linkage.

name: RecordLinkage.identifiers
dataverseAlias: Which identifiers can be used for record linkage?
displayName: Identifiers that can be used for record linkage (e.g. names, date of birth, zip code, insurance number or control number as in cancer registries).

name: RecordLinkage.furtherDetails
dataverseAlias: Please indicate any further details possibly important for conducting the record linkage
displayName: Further important details for conducting the record linkage

name: RecordLinkage.exampleResources
dataverseAlias: Please indicate additional related resources specific to record linkage
displayName: DOIs of record linkage example resources (e.g., publications).
